flawed_nl_solution:
The teams have 36 total wins because 12 + 13 + 8 = <<12+13+8=36>>36
The teams have 72 points from wins because 36 x 2 = <<36*2=72>>72
The teams have 15 total ties because 4 + 1 + 10 = <<4+1+10=15>>15
The teams have 15 points from ties because 15 x 1 = <<15*1=15>>15
The teams have 87 total points because 72 + 15 = <<72+15=87>>87
The average number of points per team is 29 because 87 / 3 = <<87/3=29>>29
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
